attributes.action: To stop the process of leaving the EU immediately
attributes.additional_details:
due to the latest BCC artical http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-42161346 (29/11/17) it has now come to light that this could cost the uk tax pay up 50 at no point was this ever discussed during the debts or  raise that this would happen, i fell that this is huge price to pay for something that most of the UK population now do no what to happen

this 50 BN could be much better used on of the government service that have been cut back on by our current government, 

there is no hard evidence that what i am saying is fully right however to just pull out of the EU and not to stay in and fix what we feel is wrong is not the solution and to then have the UK Taxpayer to cough up for this is barbaric.
